statements: SELECT * FROM patient_consent
SELECT patient_id, consent_status FROM patient_consent WHERE consent_status = true
SELECT patient_id, consent_status, consent_date FROM patient_consent ORDER BY consent_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, research_purpose FROM patient_consent WHERE research_purpose ILIKE '%cancer%'
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS average_patient_id FROM patient_consent
SELECT * FROM patient_consent LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, consent_status FROM patient_consent WHERE consent_status = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, research_purpose FROM patient_consent WHERE research_purpose = 'Cancer Research';
SELECT patient_id, consent_date FROM patient_consent ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id), SUM(CAST(consent_status AS INT)) FROM patient_consent;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE consent_granted = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM research_consent ORDER BY consent_given_at DESC;
SELECT patient_name, research_type FROM patients JOIN research_consent ON patients.patient_id = research_consent.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE consent_granted = TRUE ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, dob, consent_granted FROM patients ORDER BY consent_granted, patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, dob, consent_granted FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT p.patient_name, r.research_type FROM patients p JOIN research_consent r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.consent_given_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_consents WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT patient_id, consent_date, research_topic FROM patient_consents WHERE researcher_id = '98765432-8765-7654-3210-210987654321'
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, researcher_organization FROM researchers WHERE researcher_organization = 'Example University'
SELECT patient_id, consent_status FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_status = TRUE
SELECT topic_id, topic_description FROM research_topics
SELECT * FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_status = TRUE
SELECT patient_id, consent_date, researcher_id FROM patient_consents WHERE research_topic = 'Cancer Research' ORDER BY consent_date DESC

SELECT pc.patient_id, rt.topic_description, r.researcher_name FROM patient_consents pc JOIN research_topics rt ON pc.research_topic = rt.topic_id JOIN researchers r ON pc.researcher_id = r.researcher_id

SELECT pc.patient_id, r.researcher_organization, rt.topic_description FROM patient_consents pc JOIN researchers r ON pc.researcher_id = r.researcher_id JOIN research_topics rt ON pc.research_topic = rt.topic_id WHERE r.researcher_organization = 'Medical Research Institute'
SELECT pc.patient_id, r.researcher_name, pc.consent_date FROM patient_consents pc JOIN researchers r ON pc.researcher_id = r.researcher_id WHERE pc.consent_status = TRUE ORDER BY pc.consent_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM HealthRecords WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT request_id, researcher_name, research_purpose FROM ResearchRequests WHERE request_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT log_id, patient_id, action_performed FROM ConsentAuditTrail ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM HealthRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_purpose FROM ResearchRequests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, action_performed, action_date FROM ConsentAuditTrail WHERE action_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM patient_consents;
SELECT patient_id, consent_status FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_status = 'active';
SELECT project_name, project_lead FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT log_date, action_taken FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT data_type, data_value, data_source FROM patient_data WHERE data_source = 'EMR';
SELECT * FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_status = 'Active' ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, data_type, data_source FROM patient_data WHERE data_type = 'Medical History' AND data_source = 'Hospital';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM research_projects WHERE project_lead = 'Dr. Smith' LIMIT 5;
SELECT record_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs WHERE action_taken = 'Review' AND responsible_party = 'Compliance Team'
